Role Details: Bulk cap on 24 V rail after protection (one per 24Va/24Vs),9 V output bulk capacitor for U2
BOOT to SW cap for U2,HF decoupling (place near rail split, U2 VIN, U3 V+)
Optional RC filter with series resistor on sensor signal
Reverse polarity / series diode per 24 V digital input channel,Reverse polarity protection on 24 V input
24 V input TVS to clamp surges
2-pin output connector (24Va, switched return) for each actuator,2-pin input connector (+24V input, GND) for each digital input channel
Pin1=9V (U2_VOUT), Pin2=GND, Pin3=Sensor Signal to R23
Buck inductor for U2 SW node
Low-side switch for 24Va loads (add flyback diode per channel)
Series resistor for 24 V digital input conditioning into PLC input
Gate pull-down to keep MOSFET off at reset,U2 FB divider (top/bottom placeholders) - adjust for 9 V per datasheet,Input pull-down to define OFF state
Series resistor into op-amp buffer / protection
Buck regulator to generate 9 V from 24Vs for color sensor
Unity-gain buffer/protection for sensor 0-9 V to PLC 0-10 V input
